extendedInfo.description: South Africa radio, covers most of radio stations in Singapore. Enjoy unlimited accesses to the radio broadcasts and music.South Africa radio plays radio though Internet.South Africa Radio contains the stations:*) Sonder Grense 101.5*) Jacaranda FM 94.2*) 702 Talk Radio 92.7*) Metro FM 98.1*) Chada FM 100.8*) Hit FM 93.3*) Freedom FM 97.4*) Pretoria 104.2*) 2000 99.7*) KFM 94.5*) 5FM SABC 91.6*) 567 CapeTalk*) Islam 1548*) Classic FM 102.7*) Heart 104.9 FM*) Ukhozi FM 90.8*) Kaya FM 95.9*) Gagasi 99.5 FM*) GoodHope FM 94.0Keywords: South Africa News, South Africa Music.

reviews.title: so far, so good
reviews.comment: Much better than the previous app I had. Also, so far, no irritating ads. I love this
reviews.author: Pieter-Johan Goussard

reviews.title: Huh?
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work over wifi. AND WHERE IS 94.7???
reviews.author: Theuns van Onselen

reviews.title: Slow play
reviews.comment: All stations play in slow motion
reviews.author: Imraan van kesteren

reviews.title: Slow motion
reviews.comment: Every radio station is played slow motion...
reviews.author: skinders5
